ygData.subject: The Ramora
ygData.msgSnippet: Hell Beast and his team made there way deeper into the new ship, now in control of Unicron. He was paranoid about this, but every Predacon is paranoid in some

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Hell Beast and his team made there way deeper into the new ship, now 
in control of Unicron. He was paranoid about this, but every Predacon is 
paranoid in some way or another.
       "Do you really expect us to just walk in there? For all we know he'll 
kill us. The history tracks recorded him as almost god like. I dont think we 
know what were dealing with." Aracnia said, ever suspicious of those in power.
       Tarantulas quickly shut her up by saying, "Black Aracnia, think for a 
moment you insidious insect. If he were going to kill us then he would have 
never let us get this far. Besides, were armed and dangerous."
       She roled her optics at him as they progressed down the hall. The 
other Predacons remaind mostly quiet holding tightly to thier blasters and 
guns. Hell Beast himself cleared his throat several times and seemed to be 
forcusing on something.
       The doors in front of them slid open to reveal the master control 
room, and Unicron along with his minions. The Predacons studied the scene for 
a moment. Each taking in the detail of his features, of his presence in the 
room. Slowly they filed in and took places along the wall. The senator was 
the only one who appraoced Unicron.
       "Greetings to the long anticipated Unicron from the Predacons, please, 
let me extend our deepest admiration for this arrangement and birth of the 
Neo Decepticon Empire." Flashing a smile Hell Beast crossed his right arm 
over his chest in the classic salute to those in higher office.
       Aracnia watched us this nervously. For some reason it felt as though 
all this was leading to the realization of some terrible secret. Something 
that the Predacons had not wanted to admit, but now must face. She crossed 
her claws around her and continued her gaze.

--part1_88.3d990db.27e66fad_boundary
